Fix 1 — Migration \(supabase/migrations/20260219000000_sync_auth_users.sql\):
  - handle_new_auth_user\(\) trigger: fires AFTER INSERT on auth.users,
    auto-inserts into public.users \(id, email, display_name, password_hash=''''\)
  - One-time backfill: INSERT INTO public.users SELECT from auth.users
    WHERE NOT EXISTS in public.users — ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING \(idempotent\)
  → Run this SQL in Supabase SQL Editor to apply

Fix 2 — run-import.ts:
  - Add userEmail: string as 5th parameter
  - Step 0: upsert into public.users before any batch insert \(safety net
    for users whose row wasn''t created by the trigger yet\)
  - ON CONFLICT \(id\) DO NOTHING — preserves existing user data

Fix 3 — route.ts:
  - Extract user.email, guard against missing email → 401
  - Pass userEmail as 5th arg to runImport
